text: Soni chisimu chene Musa twampele chitabu, basi ni wapatikene mwalakwemo ukangani, mwanti likawaga lilowe lyalyalongolele lyakuumila kwa Ambuje wenu (lyangapa ilagasyo yekulungwa nnope ikaweje ku Kiyama) chisimu kungajilanyidwe chilikati chao, soni wanganyao ali nchikaiko chekulungwa chakuchikaichila chalakwecho
